Resizing function for targets.

reforge.Rd

Resizing function for targets.

Usage

reforge(object, ...)

Arguments

object

Scatterer-class object.

...

Scatterer-specific arguments

length_body

Updated body length when applicable

width_body

Updated body width when applicable

height_body

Update body height/depth when applicable

length_bladder

Updated bladder length when applicable

width_bladder

Updated bladder width when applicable

height_bladder

Updated bladder height/depth when applicable

radius_body

Updated body radius when applicable

radius_bladder

Updated bladder radius when applicable

bladder_inflation_factor

Proportional bladder volume

body_bladder_ratio_constant

Maintain body-to-bladder volume ratio when resizing

length_radius_ratio_constant

Maintain body-to-radius ratio when resizing

n_segments_body

Number of segments along the body

n_segments_bladder

Number of segments along the bladder
